articles.title: Finding the cold on a warming planet – DW – 01/19/2023 - DW (English)
articles.description: Today on Living Planet, we're traveling to some cold (and not-so-cold) places. We're asking how Europe’s snow-starved winters are affecting winter sport enthusiasts. We visit a French supermarket that's keeping things especially chilly. And we head to the lab…

articles.title: UK energy bills to fall to about £2,200 from July as wholesale gas costs drop - The Guardian
articles.description: Mild weather in Europe reduces gas demand but bills will remain higher than 2021 energy price cap
articles.content:
Annual energy bills are expected to fall to about £2,200 from July in a fillip for the government and households struggling with ballooning costs.
